peril.views.slick.helpers

Class StateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.helpers.StateHelper

  • public final class StateHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for SlickGame this object stores the instances of the various InteractiveStates of the SlickGame.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    InteractiveState, SlickGame

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      SlickAttack attack
      The SlickAttack.
      Credits credits
      The Credits page for this game.
      EndState end
      The EndState that displays the results of the SlickGame.
      SlickFortify fortify
      The SlickFortify.
      Instructions instructions
      The Instructions that displays the instructions of the SlickGame.
      LoadingScreen loadingScreen
      The LoadingScreen that will load the map specified files from memory.
      MainMenu mainMenu
      The MainMenu of the SlickGame.
      Opening opening
      The splash screen of the game.
      PlayerSelection playerSelection
      The PlayerSelection that allows the user to select how many players will be in the game.
      SlickReinforce reinforce
      The SlickReinforce.
      SlickSetup setup
      The SlickSetup that will allow the user to set up which SlickPlayer owns which SlickCountry.

                   EndState end,
                   LoadingScreen loadingScreen,
                   PlayerSelection playerSelection,
                   Credits credits,
                   Instructions instructions)
        Constructs a new StateHelper.
        Parameters:
        mainMenu - The MainMenu of the SlickGame.
        attack - The Attack
        reinforce - The SlickReinforce.
        setup - The SlickSetup.
        fortify - The SlickFortify.
        end - The EndState that displays the results of the SlickGame.
        loadingScreen - The LoadingScreen that will load the map specified files from memory.
        playerSelection - The PlayerSelection that allows the user to select how many players will be in the game.
        opening - The Opening splash screen of the game.
        credits - The Credits page for this game.
        instructions - The Instructions for the game.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(SlickGame game)
          throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Adds InteractiveStates to the SlickGame.
        Parameters:
        game - The SlickGame that the InteractiveState will be added to.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Thrown if there is a problem with adding a state.

      • addMiniMap

        public void addMiniMap(SlickBoard slickBoard,
                       int screenWidth,
                       int screenHeight,
                       GameController game)
        Adds a MiniMap to all the CoreGameStates.
        Parameters:
        slickBoard - The SlickBoard that the MiniMap will display.
        screenWidth - The width of the screen.
        screenHeight - The height of the screen.
        game - The GameController that allows the MiniMap to query the state of the game.

      • removeMiniMap

        public void removeMiniMap()
        Removes the MiniMap from all the CoreGameStates.

        public CoreGameState getSaveState(java.lang.String name)

        name - The name of the CoreGameState
        Returns:
        CoreGameState.
